mapper.select: SELECT a.*, m.nickname AS extra__writer, b.code AS extra__boardCode FROM article a INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON a.memberId = m.id INNER JOIN board b ON a.boardId = b.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND boardId = #{boardId} ORDER BY A.id DESC;

SELECT a.*, m.nickname AS extra__writer, b.code AS extra__boardCode FROM article a INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON a.id = m.id INNER JOIN board b ON a.boardId = b.id WHERE A.displayStatus = 1 AND a.id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET delDate = NOW(), displayStatus = 0, delStatus = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article SET regDate = NOW(), title = #{title}, body = #{body}, memberId = #{memberId}, boardId = #{boardId}
